author: Vexed (Vexed#9000)
description:
Create, comment, labelify and close GitHub issues, with partial PR support.

⚠ This cog requires discord.py 2 which is currently incompatible with Red and most other cogs ⚠
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: \N{WARNING SIGN} This cog requires discord.py 2 which is currently incompatible with Red and most other cogs \N{WARNING SIGN}
name: GHIssues
short: [DPY 2 ONLY] Create, comment, labelify and close GitHub issues.
